description: Configuration for deploying the LangGraph multi-agent AI project via LangGraph Studio.

agents.name: CONTEXT_MANAGER
agents.description: Agent responsible for managing conversation context.

agents.name: PROJECT_MANAGER
agents.description: Agent responsible for managing project timelines and tasks.

agents.name: PROFESSIONAL_COACH
agents.description: Agent providing professional and career guidance.

agents.name: LIFE_COACH
agents.description: Agent providing lifestyle and personal advice.

agents.name: CODER
agents.description: Agent that assists with coding tasks.

agents.name: RESEARCHER
agents.description: Agent that gathers and summarizes research and news.

agents.name: GENERAL_ASSISTANT
agents.description: Agent for general queries and assistance.
